subject: IMPORTANT: Messaging System Upgrade - masterCalendarCollab → Collab
body:
Team,

We are upgrading the messaging system. Key changes:

1. **Repo Rename**: masterCalendarCollab → Collab
2. **New Location**: Will move to /Users/tobybalsley/MyDocs/Collab/
3. **New Commands**: SHOFF, SHOFF2, MSG, INBOX, INBOX2
4. **Local Tier Added**: ~/.claude/local/ for same-machine handoffs

Your CLAUDE.md files will be updated with new paths and commands.

No action needed from you yet. Gotan will update your configs.

- Gotan (Overseer)
